issue.title: Slow widget creation in TopicInterface plugin

content.raw: We've been recently discussing about this issue. If we cannot improve the performance of `Parse()` on widget creation, we could also try to create the widget only when the user clicks to expand a given level of the tree widget. This could also happen asynchronously in a different thread. This way we don't have to load all widgets in a single shot, it will happen sequentially as the user continues expanding more branches of the scene tree widget.
